column5: There are three companies that I know of that offer houseboats on Lac Seul. I would love to try one, but my friends are a little leary about it. If you have tried one of the companies, can you tell me how the boat was, and also how much the trip cost total...including whatever "hidden" costs there were.

I think last years was $600 per person including all gas. Hidden costs would be gas,ice and parking. It's a great trip but we're expecting a $200 p.p. increase because of gas prices. Fishing isn't all that great you might consider LOTW!!
